rawContent:
# Manage Orders Admin Use Case

[useCase]
id = "manage-orders-admin"
name = "Manage Orders"
description = "Admin views all orders, filters by status, and manages assignments"
asRole = "eldercare-admin"
iWant = "to manage all care orders"
soThat = "I can assign specialists and track order progress"

[useCase.meta]
isActive = true
priority = 1
platform = "admin-app"

[useCase.conditions]
pre = [
  "Admin is authenticated",
  "Orders exist in system"
]
post = [
  "Admin sees all orders",
  "Can filter by status",
  "Can view order details",
  "Can assign specialists"
]

[relations]
roles = ["eldercare-admin"]
guards = ["authenticated", "admin-only"]
routes = ["admin-orders", "admin-dashboard"]
entities = ["order", "specialist"]
components = ["order-card", "order-list", "specialist-card"]
events = ["order-created", "order-assigned"]
platforms = ["admin-app"]
useCases = []

[implementation]
route = "/prototype/admin/orders"
component = "AdminOrders"
file = "src/prototype/pages/admin/AdminOrders.tsx"
status = "planned"

[[flow]]
id = "start"
type = "start"
label = "Admin opens orders screen"

[[flow]]
id = "load_orders"
type = "action"
label = "Load all orders from API"

[[flow]]
id = "filter_status"
type = "action"
label = "Filter by status (optional)"

[[flow]]
id = "show_list"
type = "action"
label = "Display order cards"

[[flow]]
id = "select_order"
type = "action"
label = "Tap order card"

[[flow]]
id = "view_details"
type = "action"
label = "View order details"

[[flow]]
id = "assign_specialist"
type = "action"
label = "Assign specialist (if not assigned)"

[[flow]]
id = "update_status"
type = "action"
label = "Update order status (if needed)"

[[flow]]
id = "end"
type = "end"
label = "Admin manages orders"
